segments.text: It is really gorgeous out today . I remembered the weatherman said it is supposed to rain .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I heard that it's supposed to get up to 90 degrees Fahrenheit today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? That's unusual for October , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you could never tell about the weather here in New York .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , that's true . Still , it's hard to believe . Yesterday our high was only 50 degrees Fahrenheit .
segments.speaker: S2
